head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WRIGHT, ROBERT H

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WRIGHT, ROBERT H

block.p: WRIGHT-Robert H, 84, Columbus, NC, a resident of Tryon Estates, died May 24, 2000 in Columbus, NC. Graduate of Cornell University & worked for ALCOA for 41 years. Surviving wife, Ruth Martin Wright; three sons, Robert H., Jr.; Cooper & John Wright. Memorials may be made to Tryon Presbyterian Church Founders Fund, P.O. Box 1292, Tryon, N.C. 28782.
